name: LUMA - Amiga
description:
Description

LUMA is laser based sliding puzzle game for Commodore Amiga where the goal is to connect lasers to targets of same color by using mirrors to deflect the beam. Activate the lasers using batteries. Each level must be solved within a specific amount of moves.

The game has 128 fun and challenging levels!

Can you make it to the end? :) 

LUMA is an Amiga port of the amazing game Luma, made by Shallan for the C64.

Controls

Use joystick to move cursor. Move the piece under the cursor by pressing and holding joy button while moving joystick.

You can also use arrow keys on the keyboard to move cursor. Move the piece under the cursor by pressing and holding left Alt while moving with arrow keys.

ESCAPE = Return to main menu
SPACE = Restart level
F1 = Toggle music
